languages.text: "Это — опасное решение, но я подчиняюсь Лорд-капитану. Я буду следить, чтобы этот несчастный не вызвал варп-манифестацию, да поможет нам Император".
"This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."
languages.original_text: "Это — опасное решение, но я подчиняюсь Лорд-капитану. Я буду следить, чтобы этот несчастный не вызвал варп-манифестацию, да поможет нам Император".

traits.locale_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I obey Lord Captain. I will do my best to ensure this poor soul does not cause a manifestation of the Warp, may the Emperor protect us all."
"This is a dangerous decision, but I obey Lord Captain. I will do my best to ensure this poor soul does not cause a manifestation of the Warp, may the Emperor protect us all."
"This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I shall do my utmost to ensure that this poor soul does not cause a manifestation of the Warp, Emperor save us."
"This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I shall do my utmost to ensure that this poor soul does not cause a manifestation of the Warp, Emperor save us."
"This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."
"This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

languages.text: «Es una decisión peligrosa, pero obedeceré a nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán. Haré todo lo posible por evitar que esta alma maldita provoque una manifestación de la disformidad, que el Emperador nos guarde».
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

traits.locale_text: «Es una decisión peligrosa, pero obedeceré a nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán. Haré todo lo posible por evitar que esta alma maldita provoque una manifestación de la disformidad, que el Emperador nos guarde».

languages.text: 「これは危険な決断ですが、ロード・キャプテンに従いますよ。この呪われた魂が<歪み>の顕現を起こさぬよう、全力を尽くします。皇帝の救いがありますように」
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

traits.locale_text: 「これは危険な決断ですが、ロード・キャプテンに従いますよ。この呪われた魂が<歪み>の顕現を起こさぬよう、全力を尽くします。皇帝の救いがありますように」

languages.text: “这是个危险的决定，但我愿意服从舰长大人的安排。我会尽我最大努力，确保这个被诅咒的灵魂不会招来亚空间的恐怖之物。愿帝皇保佑我们。”
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

traits.locale_text: “这是个危险的决定，但我愿意服从舰长大人的安排。我会尽我最大努力，确保这个被诅咒的灵魂不会招来亚空间的恐怖之物。愿帝皇保佑我们。”

languages.text: "Das ist eine gefährliche Entscheidung, aber ich werde dem Lord Captain gehorchen. Ich werde mein Bestes geben, damit diese verfluchte Seele keine Manifestierung des Warp verursacht, der Imperator rette uns."
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine gefährliche Entscheidung, aber ich werde dem Lord Captain gehorchen. Ich werde mein Bestes geben, damit diese verfluchte Seele keine Manifestierung des Warp verursacht, der Imperator rette uns."

languages.text: « C'est une décision dangereuse, mais je suis aux ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour m'assurer que ce misérable ne déclenche pas une manifestation du Warp. Que l'Empereur nous en préserve. »
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une décision dangereuse, mais je suis aux ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour m'assurer que ce misérable ne déclenche pas une manifestation du Warp. Que l'Empereur nous en préserve. »

languages.text: "Tehlikeli bir karar olsa da itaat edeceğim Lord Kaptan. Lanet adamın bir öteboyut tezahürüne daha yol açmaması için elimden gelen her şeyi yapacağım. İmparator bizi korusun."
languages.original_text: "This is a dangerous decision, but I will obey the Lord Captain. I will do my utmost to ensure that this cursed soul does not cause a manifestation of the warp, Emperor save us."
